imdb.plot outline: At Uncharted Play, the company mission is to connect the world through playful social invention. During the summer of 2014, the company will head off to Brazil during the FIFA World Cup to show the world that doing good doesn't need to be boring. Throughout their journey, they'll be putting the company's flagship products through some extreme testing and turning students in the local favelas into bona fide social inventors.
imdb.title: Uncharted Boundaries Presented by Toyota
plot: At Uncharted Play, the company mission is to connect the world through playful social invention. Throughout their journey, they'll be putting the company's flagship products through some extreme testing and turning students in the local favelas into bona fide social inventors.::Associate Producer
